remarks: Weaker version of ~ eleq1 (but more general than ~ elequ1 ) not depending on ~ ax-ext (nor ~ ax-12 nor ~ df-cleq ).  Remark: this can also be done with ~ eleq1i , ~ eqeltri , ~ eqeltrri , ~ eleq1a , ~ eleq1d , ~ eqeltrd , ~ eqeltrrd , ~ eqneltrd , ~ eqneltrrd , ~ nelneq .  (Contributed by BJ, 24-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: bj-eleq1w $p |- ( x = y -> ( x e. A <-> y e. A ) ) $.
